title: query stack during panic on static string literal

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
I writed this code 
```static iconSunny: [&'static str; 5] = [
		"\u{1b}[38;5;226m    \\   /    \u{1b}[0m",
		"\u{1b}[38;5;226m     .-.     \u{1b}[0m",
		"\u{1b}[38;5;226m  ― (   ) ―  \u{1b}[0m",
		"\u{1b}[38;5;226m     `-’     \u{1b}[0m",
		"\u{1b}[38;5;226m    /   \\    \u{1b}[0m"];


```
when I compile, the output is:
```
warning: static item is never used: `iconSunny`
  --> src\main.rs:35:1
   |
35 | / static iconSunny: [&'static str; 5] = [
36 | |         "\u{1b}[38;5;226m    \\   /    \u{1b}[0m",
37 | |         "\u{1b}[38;5;226m     .-.     \u{1b}[0m",
38 | | thread 'main' panicked at 'stack backtrace:
   0: std::error::<impl core::convert::From<alloc::borrow::Cow<'b, str>> for alloc::boxed::Box<(dyn std::error::Error +
core::marker::Sync + core::marker::Send + 'a)>>::from
   1: std::panicking::take_hook
   2: std::panicking::take_hook
   3: rustc::ty::structural_impls::<impl rustc::ty::context::Lift<'tcx> for rustc::ty::adjustment::AutoBorrow<'a>>::lift
_to_tcx
   4: rustc::ty::context::TyCtxt::generate_borrow_of_any_match_input
   5: std::panicking::rust_panic_with_hook
   6: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt
   7: std::panicking::begin_panic_fmt
   8: <rustc_errors::emitter::EmitterWriter as rustc_errors::emitter::Emitter>::emit
   9: RtlAllocateHeap
  10: RtlFreeHeap
  11: HeapFree
  12: _rdl_dealloc
  13: rustc_errors::Handler::force_print_db
  14: rustc_errors::diagnostic_builder::DiagnosticBuilder::emit
  15: <rustc::middle::dead::LifeSeeder<'k, 'tcx> as rustc::hir::itemlikevisit::ItemLikeVisitor<'v>>::visit_item
  16: <rustc::middle::dead::DeadVisitor<'a, 'tcx> as rustc::hir::intravisit::Visitor<'tcx>>::visit_item
  17: rustc::dep_graph::prev::PreviousDepGraph::node_count
  18: rustc::middle::dead::check_crate
  19: <rustc_driver::derive_registrar::Finder as rustc::hir::itemlikevisit::ItemLikeVisitor<'v>>::visit_item
  20: <rustc_driver::pretty::NoAnn<'hir> as rustc_driver::pretty::HirPrinterSupport<'hir>>::sess
  21: <rustc_driver::derive_registrar::Finder as rustc::hir::itemlikevisit::ItemLikeVisitor<'v>>::visit_item
  22: <rustc_driver::CompilationFailure as core::fmt::Debug>::fmt
  23: rustc_driver::driver::compile_input
  24: rustc_driver::run_compiler
  25: <rustc_driver::profile::trace::Query as core::fmt::Debug>::fmt
  26: <rustc_driver::derive_registrar::Finder as rustc::hir::itemlikevisit::ItemLikeVisitor<'v>>::visit_item
  27: _rust_maybe_catch_panic
  28: rustc_driver::profile::dump
  29: rustc_driver::main
  30: std::rt::lang_start_internal
  31: <unknown>
  32: BaseThreadInitThunk
  33: RtlInitializeExceptionChain
  34: RtlInitializeExceptionChain
query stack during panic:
end of query stack

error: internal compiler error: unexpected panic

```
rustc:1.29.2
